title: Newly Released U.S. Census Records Reveal Time Capsule of Life in 1950
sub_head: At least 26 million Americans who were living here during the 1950 census are still alive. They and their relatives will be able to peruse a database of the handwritten records on April 1.
body: At least 26 million Americans who were living here during the 1950 census are still alive. They and their relatives will be able to peruse a database of the handwritten records on April 1.
